query:
UPDATE ingredientUnits SET displayName = CASE name
  WHEN 'pieces' THEN 'Piece (def: 1 oz)'
  WHEN 'oz' THEN 'Ounce (oz)'
  WHEN 'lb' THEN 'Pound (lb)'
  WHEN 'kg' THEN 'Kilogram (kg)'
  WHEN 'g' THEN 'Gram (g)'
  WHEN 'cup' THEN 'Cup (c)'
  WHEN 'tbsp' THEN 'Tablespoon (tbsp)'
  WHEN 'tsp' THEN 'Teaspoon (tsp)'
  WHEN 'ml' THEN 'Milliliter (mL)'
  WHEN 'l' THEN 'Liter (L)'
  WHEN 'gal' THEN 'Gallon (gal)'
  WHEN 'pt' THEN 'Pint (pt)'
  WHEN 'qt' THEN 'Quart (qt)'
  WHEN 'fl oz' THEN 'Fluid Ounce (fl oz)'
  ELSE displayName
END
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute UPDATE ingredientUnits SET displayName = CASE name
  WHEN 'pieces' THEN 'Piece (def: 1 oz)'
  WHEN 'oz' THEN 'Ounce (oz)'
  WHEN 'lb' THEN 'Pound (lb)'
  WHEN 'kg' THEN 'Kilogram (kg)'
  WHEN 'g' THEN 'Gram (g)'
  WHEN 'cup' THEN 'Cup (c)'
  WHEN 'tbsp' THEN 'Tablespoon (tbsp)'
  WHEN 'tsp' THEN 'Teaspoon (tsp)'
  WHEN 'ml' THEN 'Milliliter (mL)'
  WHEN 'l' THEN 'Liter (L)'
  WHEN 'gal' THEN 'Gallon (gal)'
  WHEN 'pt' THEN 'Pint (pt)'
  WHEN 'qt' THEN 'Quart (qt)'
  WHEN 'fl oz' THEN 'Fluid Ounce (fl oz)'
  ELSE displayName
END
